text:
Brand New FinTech Startup | Onsite in Washington, DC | full-time

We all are coming from a very successful startup that exited about 2 years ago. Time for round two. We have a great team and are hiring for many roles. Currently looking for talented full stack javascript engineers with single page app experience. Stack includes React, AWS, Node, etc.

Also UX and Designers - would love to hear from you! All jobs posted on linkedin at https://www.linkedin.com/vsearch/j?page_num=1&locationType=Y...

Email engineering@unitedincome.com
